pli-tv-pvr2.6:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1: Of the four legal questions which legal question (is raised by) the offences for a nun who, filled with desire … ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.3: it is the legal question concerning offences …
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1: For one who is partaking of … curds, having asked for them …
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.3: it is the legal question concerning offences.
pli-tv-pvr2.6:3.1: Concluded is the Sixth Chapter: on Legal Questions
